title: Set logging level
name: setLogLevel
description: Sets the log level of the hapi for both the device and the API.

parameters.name: level
parameters.notes: The desired log level. Can be LogLevel.None, LogLevel.Info, LogLevel.Full, LogLevel.Debug

parameters.name: device
parameters.notes: This is used if you want to send the operation to a specific device. Recommended if you are using multiple devices

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device

example:
//Sets the log level to info
api.setLogLevel(LogLevel.info);
